content.preview_text: {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} {{#is attributes.event_name 'ADJ_FAILED_SUBMIT_ORDER'}} You can still order tests online. {{else}} We’ll email you when it's ready for pick up. {{/is}} {{else is attributes.order_type 'SPLITFULFILLMENT'}} We'll email you another update by {{formatDate all_order_items.[0].attributes.promise_date '' 'dddd[,] MMMM D' 'en'}}. {{else is attributes.order_type 'ETW'}} {{#is attributes.store_area 'LOCKER'}} We’ll email you when it's ready for pick up. {{else}} You should receive it by {{formatDate all_order_items.[0].attributes.promise_date '' 'dddd[,] MMMM D' 'en'}}. {{/is}} {{else is attributes.order_type 'REFILL'}} {{#is attributes.store_area 'LOCKER'}} We’ll email you when it's ready for pick up. {{else}} {{#if attributes.pickup_barcode}} You should receive it by {{formatDate all_order_items.[0].attributes.promise_date '' 'dddd[,] MMMM D' 'en'}}. {{else}} You should receive it by {{formatDate all_order_items.[0].attributes.promise_date '' 'dddd[,] MMMM D' 'en'}}. {{/if}} {{/is}} {{else}} {{#if attributes.pickup_barcode}} Thanks for order #{{order_number}}. Pickup barcode inside. Show it at the pharmacy counter to get your Rx. See full order details in this email. {{else}} {{#is attributes.order_type 'OTCHS'}} Thanks for your order #{{attributes.display_order_number}}! See full order details in this email. We’ll email you when your order ships. {{else}} You should receive it by {{formatDate all_order_items.[0].attributes.promise_date '' 'dddd[,] MMMM D' 'en'}}. {{/is}} {{/if}} {{/is}}

custom.legal:
{{{{raw}}}}
{{#is attributes.order_type 'OTCHS'}} The fastest and easiest way to place an order is online. To find your plan, visit: {{{attributes.web_url}}}.

{{/is}} You received this email to confirm the action noted above. {{#is attributes.order_type 'OTCHS'}} You can view the {{#isnt attributes.plan_id '11'}} OTC Health Solutions {{/isnt}} privacy policy in the footer of your plan’s webpage. For any additional questions about your {{#isnt attributes.plan_id '11'}} OTC Health Solutions {{/isnt}} order, contact us at: {{#if attributes.phone_number}} {{{attributes.phone_number}}}. {{else}} 1-888-628-2770. {{/if}} {{else}} Your email address will not be saved or used for any other purpose unless you chose to sign up for special email offers when you registered. You can change your email preference in My Account at any time. We value your privacy and the security of personal information and never give or sell any specific information about you to any manufacturer or direct marketers. {{#isnt attributes.event_name 'ADJ_FAILED_SUBMIT_ORDER'}} If you have questions or concerns about how we protect your privacy, read our Privacy Policy. {{/isnt}} {{#if attributes.bag_fee}} {{#isnt attributes.bag_fee '0'}}

A temporary hold of ${{priceDecimals attributes.bag_fee}} will be added to your order to cover any bag fees, which vary by location. The hold will be removed if no bag fees are applicable or adjusted to reflect the actual number of bags used for your order.{{/isnt}} {{/if}} {{#is attributes.order_type 'SDD'}}

Same day delivery details
Same day delivery is available in as little as 3 hours for retail orders with an eligible address. Same day qualified orders must be placed at least 4 hours before 8 pm or store closing time, whichever is earlier. Select stores may have extended hours (including 24 hour delivery). Some deliveries may not be eligible for Same Day Delivery due to delivery address, holidays, weather or other delivery constraints. Customers are not required to be present for deliveries. Delivery window is only an estimate and may be subject to delays. Delivery is not available in all locations, including Puerto Rico and Hawaii.

Same day delivery payment details
Online and in-store pricing may vary. Some items may not be available for delivery. Coupons, ExtraBucks® Rewards, and certain in-store and online promotions may not be applicable to delivery orders, and are subject to CVS Pharmacy® coupon policy. FSA/HSA cards may not be used for delivery fees. Payment must be made at time of order. Refunds will be issued to the original form of payment. Same-day delivery shipping fees are non-refundable for customer cancelled orders. Deliveries must either be entirely accepted or rejected. No partial order acceptance is permitted. Call your local CVS pharmacy for additional details. {{else is attributes.order_type 'SDD-Mixed'}}

Same day delivery details
Same day delivery is available in as little as 3 hours for retail orders with an eligible address. Same day qualified orders must be placed at least 4 hours before 8 pm or store closing time, whichever is earlier. Select stores may have extended hours (including 24 hour delivery). Some deliveries may not be eligible for Same Day Delivery due to delivery address, holidays, weather or other delivery constraints. Customers are not required to be present for deliveries. Delivery window is only an estimate and may be subject to delays. Delivery is not available in all locations, including Puerto Rico and Hawaii.

Same day delivery payment details
Online and in-store pricing may vary. Some items may not be available for delivery. Coupons, ExtraBucks® Rewards, and certain in-store and online promotions may not be applicable to delivery orders, and are subject to CVS Pharmacy® coupon policy. FSA/HSA cards may not be used for delivery fees. Payment must be made at time of order. Refunds will be issued to the original form of payment. Same-day delivery shipping fees are non-refundable for customer cancelled orders. Deliveries must either be entirely accepted or rejected. No partial order acceptance is permitted. Call your local CVS pharmacy for additional details. {{else}} {{#unless (itemFlagFinder all_order_items 'is_pharm' 'true')}} {{#isnt attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}}

*All item-level coupons, offers and discounts are included in the item price. ExtraBucks Rewards®, CarePass™ rewards and order-level discounts will be prorated across all items in your order when it ships.

**It may take up to two days for ExtraBucks® Rewards to become available in the Deals and Rewards section after your qualifying purchase ships. Progress shown under {{#if (itemFlagFinder all_order_items 'is_pharm' 'true')}} Order Status and History {{else}} Order Status and History {{/if}} is an estimate and actual earning progress may vary. {{#isnt attributes.order_type 'BOPIS'}}

Your order may arrive in multiple shipments on different dates. You can check the status of your order in the {{#if (itemFlagFinder all_order_items 'is_pharm' 'true')}} Order Status and History {{else}} Order Status and History {{/if}} {{/isnt}} section of your account. {{/isnt}} {{/unless}} {{#is attributes.order_type 'REFILL'}}

[†]This is an estimated cost. Final cost is determined when your prescription is filled. Cost is based on insurance copays and deductibles. If the cost of your prescription(s) increases, we will contact you and ask for your consent before we fill the prescription(s). {{#if attributes.pickup_barcode}}

We will email you when your order is ready for pick up. If you have any questions about your order, please email customercare@cvs.com or call 1-888-607-4287.
{{else}}

We will email you when your order has shipped, and the email will contain a tracking link so you can check the progress of your delivery. We will only charge you for items when they ship. If you have any questions about your shipment, please email customercare@cvs.com or call 1-888-607-4287.
{{/if}} {{else}} {{#if attributes.pickup_barcode}}

If you have any questions about your order, please email customercare@cvs.com or call 1-888-607-4287.
{{/if}} {{/is}} {{#unless attributes.pickup_barcode}} {{#isnt attributes.order_type 'REFILL'}} {{#isnt attributes.order_type 'CF-STS'}} {{#isnt attributes.order_type 'BOPIS'}} {{#isnt attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}}

We will email you when your order has shipped, and the email will contain a tracking link so you can check the progress of your delivery. We will only charge you for items when they ship. If you have any questions about your order, please email customercare@cvs.com or call 1-888-607-4287.
{{/isnt}} {{/isnt}} {{/isnt}} {{/isnt}} {{/unless}} {{#is attributes.order_type 'CF-STS'}}
We will email you when your order is ready for pickup. You have prepaid for this order, so a hold will be placed on your payment account for 6 days. We will hold your item(s) for 6 days from the date of your pickup ready email. If you don't pick up your order in that timeframe, your order will be canceled and payment will be refunded. However, your original payment could remain pending with your bank for up to 14 days, depending on your bank's policies. If you have any questions about your pickup order, please email customercare@cvs.com or call 1-800-SHOP CVS (1-800-746-7287).
{{/is}} {{#is attributes.order_type 'BOPIS'}}

We will email you when your order is ready for pickup. You have prepaid for this order, so a hold will be placed on your payment account for 6 days. We will hold your item(s) for 3 days from the date of your pickup ready email. If you don't pick up your order in that timeframe, your order will be canceled and payment will be refunded. However, your original payment could remain pending with your bank for up to 14 days, depending on your bank's policies. If you have any questions about your pickup order, please call your store at {{{attributes.store_phone}}}.
{{/is}} {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} {{#isnt attributes.event_name 'ADJ_FAILED_SUBMIT_ORDER'}} Please note that At-Home COVID-19 tests are nonrefundable. {{/isnt}}

If you have any questions about your order, please call your insurer. {{/is}} {{#if attributes.pickup_barcode}} {{#is attributes.order_type 'BOPIS'}}

Please check our Return Policy if you want to return a store item.
{{/is}} {{else}} {{#isnt attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}}

Please check our Return Policy if you want to return a store item.
{{/isnt}} {{/if}} {{/is}} {{/is}}

One CVS Drive, Woonsocket, RI 02895

If you don't pick up your order in that timeframe, your prepayment will expire and you'll have to pay again in person.

However, your original payment could remain pending with your bank for up to 14 days, depending on your bank's policies.
